name: WebGLRenderingContext.stencilMaskSeparate
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.stencilMaskSeparate() method of the WebGL API controls enabling and disabling of front and/or back writing of individual bits in the stencil planes.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glStencilMaskSeparate' in OpenGL ES 2.0.
